mapper.select: /* SQL_ID : kr.centero.common.user.mapper.UserMapper.findAll */ SELECT tu.user_id, tu.username, tu.password, tu.email, tr.role_name FROM tb_user tu INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur ON tur.user_id = tu.user_id INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tr.role_id = tur.role_id ORDER BY tu.username, tr.role_name
